text: "Cheek To Cheek" is a pop song by Fred Astaire provided was written by Irving Berlin in 1935. Taco Ockerse using the song synthpop version of Cheek To Cheek in 1983 by RCA Records. in other media by soundtrack from television and movies included, Nutri Ventures in English-dubbed version of the first episode. ==References== Category:1935 songs Category:Jazz pop songs Category:Fred Astaire songs Category:Louis Armstrong songs Category:Ella Fitzgerald songs Category:Peggy Lee songs Category:Billie Holiday songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Eva Cassidy songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:Lady Gaga songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:The Sensational Alex Harvey Band songs
title: Cheek to Cheek (song)
